The source for this document can be gotten from Bazaar:

<pre>
bzr cat lp:~ted/dbus-test-runner/merge-policy/tests/manual
</pre>

The source is in the standard manual testing format for Ubuntu QA: <nowiki>[[Testing-TestCaseFormat]]</nowiki>

=== Test Case: dbus-test-runner/build-hud ===
==== Procedure ====
* Grab the build dependencies for HUD: <code>sudo apt-get build-dep hud</code>
* Install the Bazaar build tools: <code>sudo apt-get install bzr-builddeb</code>
* Get a copy of HUD trunk: <code>bzr co --lightweight lp:hud</code>
* Build HUD: <code>cd hud ; bzr bd</code>
** HUD should build and run it's test suite successfully
** The package may not build successfully, but we just want the test suite to pass
